title: At UK Asylum Center, Young Migrants Describe Hunger, Illness and Trauma
description: The overcrowded facility in southeastern England is supposed to house asylum seekers for very short periods, but teenagers who have stayed there detailed inhumane conditions and long stays.
dc:creator: Euan Ward
category: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
media:credit: William Edwards/Agence France-Presse â€” Getty Images
media:description: The Manston migrant center, near Ramsgate in southeastern England.
